question:
Binder Note High a    Penguin is aquatic, flightless bird. Most of their species live in cold climates area. They have
adapted to live in cold climates.
Penguins have to keep body temperatures high to remain active. They have thick skin and lots of
fat (blubber) under their skin to keep warm in cold weather.
They also huddle together with their friends to keep warm. Emperor penguins have developed a
social behavior that when it gets cold, they huddle together in groups that may comprise several
thousand penguins.
The dark colored feathers of a penguin's back surface absorb heat from the sun. It also keeps
them to warm up too.
Penguins tightly packed feathers overlap to provide waterproofing and warmth. They coat their
feathers with oil from a gland near the tail to increase impermeability. Waterproofing is critical to
5. From the text we know that...
A. penguin fats help them absorb the heat from sun
B. penguins huddle together during mating season
C. penguins can swim faster by coating their feather with oil
D. penguin fats protect them from cold
E. penguins' beaks are waterproof​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. penguin fats protect them from cold

Palestine, for Palestine we pray shortly after praying for personal reasons. Don't underestimate the Palestinian state, they survive on their land. not for their personal survival but, for Islam too .. because the Aqsa mosque stands majestically there.

I have remembered, someone asked one of them "why are you staying in Palestine? why don't you go?" then they (the Palestinians) replied,"We are still living in Palestine on behalf of the Muslims. If not us, who will protect us?"

Everyone knows that Palestine is one of the holiest places for Muslims, Christians and Jews.

There is the Al-Aqsa Mosque, the Holy Church of the Holy Sepulcher, and the Wailing Wall. From these places, the name of the Great and One God was echoed in various languages and dialeg.

yarussalem atau Palestina.

adalah tempat hadirnya tiga agama langit. Suara azan dari menara masjid, bunyi lonceng gereja, dan kidung-kidung Ibrani dari sinagoge, acap terdengar bersamaan.

untuk Palestina kami berdoa sesaat setelah berdoa untuk alasan pribadi. Jangan meremehkan negara Palestina, mereka bertahan di tanah mereka. bukan untuk kelangsungan hidup pribadi mereka tetapi, untuk Islam juga.Jangan meremehkan negara Palestina, mereka bertahan di tanah mereka. bukan untuk kelangsungan hidup pribadi mereka tapi, untuk Islam juga.. karena masjid Aqsa berdiri megah disana.

aku ingat, seseorang bertanya kepada salah satu dari mereka "kenapa kamu tinggal di palestina? kenapa kamu tidak pergi?" kemudian mereka (orang-orang Palestina) menjawab, “Kami masih hidup di Palestina atas nama umat Islam. Jika bukan kami, siapa yang akan melindungi?

Semua orang tahu bahwa Palestina adalah salah satu tempat paling suci bagi umat Islam, Kristen, dan Yahudi.

Ada Masjid Al-Aqsa, Gereja Suci Makam Suci, dan Tembok Ratapan.Dari tempat-tempat tersebut, nama Tuhan Yang Maha Esa dikumandangkan dalam berbagai bahasa dan dialeg.

jadi, jika kita manusia berusaha lah membantu dengan cara apapun, berdoa, membantu jasa ataupun dana. ingatkan mereka bahwa mereka tidak sendiri

related_questions.question: Membuat kalimat positif present perfect dengan kata kerja forget​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I have forgotten learn English for one week.

Penjelasan:

forgotten adalah irreguler verb dari forget.

Present perfect tense

didefinisikan sebagai suatu bentuk kata kerja yang digunakan untuk menyatakan suatu aksi atau situasi yang telah dimulai di masa lalu dan masih berlanjut sampai sekarang atau telah selesai pada suatu titik waktu tertentu di masa lalu namun efeknya masih berlanjut.

Rumus Present Perfect Tense :

Subject + has/have + verb 3

related_questions.question:
1. If I... (to study), I... (to pass) ... the exam    C. Studied - will study
A. Study - would study X
B. Study - will study
D. Studied - would have studied
2. If the sun ... (to shine), we... (to walk) into town
C. Shines - will shine
A. Shine - would shine
D. Shone - would have shone
B. Shine - will shine
(to see the doctor
3. If he ... (to have) a temperature, he
A. Have - will see
C. Had - will see
B. Has - will see
D. Having - will see
4. If you (go)... by bike more often, you (be/not).. so flabby
A Go - would not be
B. Went - would not be
C. Goes - would not be
D. Going would not be​

answers.answer:
Jawaban

1. If I STUDIED, I WOULD pass the exam.

2. If the sun shines, we will walk into town

3. If he has a temperature, he will see the doctor. (textnya qkira kira aja cz klimat g lngkap)

4. B

Penjelasan:

coba cek soal 1-3. No.4 aj yg soalnya bner nulisnya
